title: "Shiny in a Dashboard"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
  orientation: columns
  vertical_layout: fill
runtime: shiny #Include this command to use Shiny
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(shiny)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)

data(mtcars)
```

Input{.sidebar}
----------------------------------------------------------------
### User Input

```{r}
radioButtons(inputId="my_cyl",label="Cylinders",choices=c(4,6,8))
```

Column
----------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart

```{r}
renderPlotly(
    ggplotly(ggplot(filter(mtcars,cyl==input$my_cyl),aes(x=mpg,y=wt))+geom_point())
)
```

#Publish on Shiny.io using the Publish button in the visualization output
